title: Designing Deep Learning Assessments in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and mid-level job-specific expertise
context.additional_context: PBL-based social studies curriculum in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Focuses on evaluating deep learning outcomes in blended (online/face-to-face) settings for manager/leader role learners

learning_goals: Learners can present project outcomes utilizing higher-order thinking skills (critical analysis, problem-solving) in a blended learning environment
Learners can report at least three collaborative learning experiences with peers and instructors through online/in-person interactive activities
Learners can evaluate their learning process and specify future application plans through reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
